alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 17 at 12:59AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...Wind Advisory remains in effect ... * Strong winds of 25 to 35 mph with higher gusts... * TIMING...through Saturday morning * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1 VAVEAO ASO TOANA`I TESEMA 17 2022 ...O LOO FAAAUAU LE FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * O savili malolosi e 25 i le 35 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u i taimi... * TAIMI...E aafia ai le atunu`u se`ia oo atu i le taeao o le Aso Toona`i. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E ono pauu laau, lelea mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina ma e faaleagaina foi apa ma taualuga o fale. E sousou foi le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi, o lona uiga o savili e 30 i le 40 mph ma e agi fa`ata`uta`u, o loo aafia ai pea le atunu`u. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Fa`amolemole ia e fa`aeteete.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
